CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
description: The function actualize is vulnerable to SQL Injection. The propName parameter is directly concatenated into the SQL query without any form of sanitization or parameterization. This means that if a user can control the value of propName, they can manipulate the SQL query to perform actions that the developer did not intend, such as viewing, modifying, or deleting data.
